title: Activity-Based Interactive Online Mathematics Educational Materials Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematical concepts and workplace data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Need for geographically dispersed developer teams to collaboratively create customized mathematics educational materials considering cognitive load, emphasizing real-time interaction and progress-tracking features.

learning_goals: Learners can develop visualization materials for math concepts by applying activity-based interaction design principles
Learners can design three or more personalized learning activity scenarios that support different cognitive styles
Learners can create interactive quiz modules for mathematical problem-solving in real-time video environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
